title: AI Face Rating
subtitle: Upload your photo and get an AI-powered attractiveness score

upload.title: Upload Your Photo
upload.dragText: Drag and drop your photo here, or click to select
upload.privacy: Your photo will not be saved or shared without your consent

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.clearPhoto: Please upload a clear front-facing photo with a fully visible face
tips.noFilters: Avoid using heavily beautified or filtered photos
tips.goodLighting: Well-lit photos provide more accurate analysis results

progress.title: AI Analysis in Progress...
progress.subtitle: Please wait while we analyze your photo using advanced AI technology
progress.aiProcessing: AI is applying deep learning algorithms for precise analysis

result.title: Analysis Results
result.disclaimer: This analysis is for entertainment purposes only and does not reflect real beauty standards.

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid image file
errors.noFaceDetected: No face detected in the image, please upload a clear photo with a visible face

error.network: Network error, please check your connection
error.server: Server error, please try again later
error.invalid_image: Invalid image format, please upload JPG, PNG or WebP format
error.image_too_large: Image is too large, please upload an image smaller than 10MB
error.no_face_detected: No face detected in the image, please upload a photo with a clear face

notAnalyzable.title: Need a Clearer Photo

items.1: Face the camera directly with clear eyes
items.2: Avoid hats, sunglasses or other obstructions
items.3: Keep the photo clear and avoid blur
items.4: Ensure only one person is in the photo

notAnalyzable.description: Our AI needs a clear facial photo to provide accurate analysis results
